verbs.description: [ARGM-ADV: Seriously] , [ARG0: the Pentagon] [V: has] [ARG1: no idea what Trump just promised North Korea in terms of a " suspension " of joint exercises with South Korea] .
Seriously , the Pentagon has no idea [ARG2: what] [ARG0: Trump] [ARGM-ADV: just] [V: promised] [ARG1: North Korea] [ARG2: in terms of a " suspension " of joint exercises with South Korea] .
